title: Daniel’s Vision of Four Beasts
summary: Summary for Daniel 7. This chapter contains powerful stories of faith and prophetic visions pointing to God's sovereignty over kingdoms and history.

faq.question: What does Daniel 7 reveal about God?
faq.answer: God is sovereign over all earthly kingdoms and honors those who are faithful to Him.

faq.question: What is a key takeaway from Daniel 7?
faq.answer: Trust in God’s power and remain faithful even in difficult or hostile environments.
